abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: If you move at least 15 feet in a straight line towards your target before attacking with a melee attack, they suffer an additional 1d8 damage from the attack.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with an attack on your turn, you can use your reaction to move up to half your movement speed (towards a new target) and make a claw attack.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: You force a target within 10 feet to make a Will saving throw against your Ability DC. On a failed save, your target has disadvantage on all attacks against any target other than yourself.

actions.name: Multi-attack - 2 Actions
actions.description: Your form is capable of making two claw attacks, or a claw attack and a bite / gore attack without suffering a multi-attack penalty

actions.name: Claws - 1 Action
actions.description:
Melee Attack: Wisdom + Your Level to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d6 + Your Wisdom Slashing Damage

actions.name: Bite / Gore - 1 Action
actions.description:
Melee Attack: Wisdom + Your Level to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + Your Wisdom Piercing Damage

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: If you move at least 15 feet in a straight line towards your target before attacking with a melee attack, they must make a Fortitude saving throw against your Ability DC or be knocked Prone. Any Bite attacks you make against targets knocked prone by this ability have their critical range reduced by 1.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: When you attack an enemy from stealth or from a flanking position, you have advantage on the attack roll

abilities.name: Rampage

actions.name: Bite - 1 Action

abilities.name: Magical Resistance - Reaction
abilities.description: You can spend your reaction gain a +3 bonus to any saving throw against a magical effect

abilities.name: Elemental Breath - 2 Actions
abilities.description: You exhale an element of your choice (Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison) in a 20 foot cone. Each target within the cone must make a Reflex save or take Xd6 elemental damage, where X is Your Wisdom modifier. On a successful save, targets take half damage from the effect. Usable once per shift.

abilities.name: Displacement - 1 Action
abilities.description: You teleport up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

abilities.name: Wings
abilities.description: You gain a Fly speed of 40 ft.

abilities.name: Spike Fling - 1 Action
abilities.description:
Ranged Attack: Wisdom + Your Level to hit, Range 90ft, one target.
On hit 2d6+Wis Poison damage.
You can replace any one attack from your multi-attack with this action.
